mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture(lectureNum, userId, lectureName, lectureInfo, major,year,semester,day,time,regDate,midSDate,finSDate) VALUES(lecture_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{lectureName}, #{lectureInfo}, #{major}, #{year}, #{semester}, #{day}, #{time}, SYSDATE, #{midSDate}, #{finSDate})
mapper.select: SELECT lectureNum, userId, lectureName, lectureInfo, major, year,semester,day,time,regDate,midSDate,finSDate FROM lecture WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM lectureApply WHERE lectureNum=#{lectureNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lectureVideoFile(videoFileNum, lectureNum, videoTotalTime, videoName, videoFileName, regDate) VALUES (lectureVideoFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{lectureNum}, #{videoTotalTime}, #{videoName}, #{videoFileName}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT l.lectureNum, videoFileNum, lectureName, videoName, videoTotalTime, TO_CHAR(v.regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate FROM lecture l JOIN lectureVideoFile v ON l.lectureNum=v.lectureNum WHERE userId=#{userId}
